pull.title: refactor: s/command/msg_type/ in CNetMsgMaker and CSerializedNetMsg
pull.body: Follow-up PR for #18533 -- another small step towards getting rid of the confusing "command" terminology. Also see PR #18610 which tackled the functional tests.
